overall.description: Split an array into multiple sub-arrays vertically (row-wise).

indices_or_sections.description: Array to be divided into sub-arrays.

axis.description: If indices_or_sections is an integer, N, the array will be divided into N equal arrays along axis.  If such a split is not possible, an error is raised. If indices_or_sections is a 1-D array of sorted integers, the entries indicate where along axis the array is split.  For example, [2, 3] would, for axis=0, result in   ary[:2] ary[2:3] ary[3:]   If an index exceeds the dimension of the array along axis, an empty sub-array is returned correspondingly.

sub-arrays.description: The axis along which to split, default is 0.
